meanings.definition: Control every part, however small, of (an enterprise or activity)
meanings.sent1: She micromanages every project to make sure nothing is missed.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor constantly micromanages his team, causing frustration.
meanings.sent3: The robot that micromanages the assembly line is a perfectionist!
meanings.sent4: Her tendency to micromanage is like having a magnifying glass on every detail.
meanings.sent5: He micromanages the garden, ensuring each plant gets just the right amount of water.

meanings.definition: Manage with excessive control or attention to minor details
meanings.sent1: My mom micromanages my homework, checking every answer carefully.
meanings.sent2: The chef tends to micromanage the kitchen, making sure every dish is perfect.
meanings.sent3: The cat micromanages the toy mouse, making sure it doesn't escape!
meanings.sent4: His approach to leadership is like a conductor who micromanages every note.
meanings.sent5: She micromanages her schedule, planning every minute of her day.
